cons: Not as effective for cracked skin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cream

I bought two, making an assumption about the quality and now regret it . Amazon used to sell another lavender hand lotion by another reputable company (which has been around for much longer) and L’Occitane does not even compare to the quality of the aforementioned company’s lotion Let’s see if this gets posted

customer_reviews.text: Awesome creme! Works great on my arms, legs, hands! Love me some lavender!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Strong lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this hand cream. I keep it on my bedside table b/c I find the lavender scent relaxing as I'm falling asleep. The lavender L'Occitane is not as thick & creamy as the original hand cream though. It's much lighter and thinner. The scent is very strong & distinct though. I recommend it, but if you're looking for the dense cream in the original or don't like a strong scent I'm not sure you'll be as happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great lavender scent that lasts longer than a cologne. Cream is moisturizing and lasts a long time but somehow not overly sticky.
